WRITING.TEXT: I think the Joker looks down on anyone who loves him.

WRITING.TITLE: Wonder Woman / Classic Film Mashup Poster
Wonder Woman/Classic Movie Mash Up Poster

WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys,
I have to agree with apathy and uber in that I really enjoyed it, and found it moving on a number of levels.
I have a different take about how it's an allegory on my site here:
